Name: GUILTY
About the game: GUILTY is a first-person psychological horror game. STORYLINE Play as Peter , an ex-military, and discover what your past hides. Access your unconscious to remember the traumatic and most terrifying memories that are hidden. Find out what happened to Linda , Peter's wife. A traumatic past that gives you a sense of guilt. What would you do if past trauma no longer allowed you to have a normal life? GAMEPLAY With just the help of a flashlight, explore a national park and a terrifying house inside your mind to relive your traumas and face them. Solve puzzles to gain access to important areas. Explore, remember, run and survive. Try to overcome your fears. Collect memory fragments to access your unconscious. Explore caves where a dark ritual is taking place. Find out what's real and what's hallucination. Be tormented by darkness. Explore the house to find levers that unlock access to restricted areas. Discover the correct way to position the mannequins to progress in the game. The answers you find facing your fears!
